item.title: Almond butter
item.description: Related: Recipes References: https://detoxinista.com/how-to-make-homemade-almond-butter/ https://www.notenoughcinnamon.com/make-almond-butter/ https://cookieandkate.com/homemade-almond-butter-recipe/ Ingredients 508g of almonds, $11.20 (from Coles at $22/kg) CAN GET IT CHEAPER SOMEWHERE ELSE Approx 3.5cups?? General cost of almond butter $5.70/250g jar (Coles, Woolies) $4.70??/240g jar (Aldi) Seems worth it to make your own, if not for time spent Procedure Roast almonds Preheat oven to 180C Roast for 10min, tossing halfway through Process almonds High-powered food processor
